title: Aggeus and Abdias prophetes the one corrected, the other newly added, and both at large declared.
author: Pilkington, James, 1520?-1576.
notes: Part 2 (formerly STC 19928) has caption title on 2B2r, reading: The vision of Abdy.
Some print show-through; slight print loss on G8.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
